full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,LAM RIM SOGS NAS 'BYUNG BA'I NYAMS LEN GYI RIM PA DANG YAN LAG BDUN PA BYED TSUL RNAM PA GNYIS BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @016A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI, DAD DANG RNAM DPYOD LDAN PA'I GNAS BRTAN DPAL 'BYOR RGYA MTSOS BSKUL BA'I NGOR SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG RAB 'BYAMS SMRA BA BSHAD SGRUB MING CAN GYIS RGYAS BSDUS CI LTAR 'TSAMS PA NYID DU LEGS PAR SBYAR BAS, GZHAN LA PHAN THOGS PAR GYUR CIG ,'DIS KYANG KUN MKHYEN RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,MANGGA LAm, ,)
